prod_desc: Join Batman™ in a comical food fight!
prod_long_desc:
Help Batman™ fend off Egghead™ and Condiment King's food-firing attacks with THE LEGO® BATMAN MOVIE: Egghead Mech Food Fight set. The Egghead Mech features an opening egg-shaped minifigure cockpit, posable arms and legs, a fried egg disc shooter, spinning and grabbing whisk/claw and a canister containing chicken and egg elements. Condiment King is armed with ketchup and mustard stud shooters. This LEGO Batman toy includes 3 minifigures.
Includes 3 minifigures: Batman™, Egghead™ and Condiment King™.
Features an opening egg-shaped minifigure cockpit for Egghead™, posable arms and legs, a fried egg disc shooter, 3 discs with fried egg decoration, spinning and grabbing whisk/claw, and a storage canister containing 1 chicken and 3 egg elements.
Weapons include Batman's grappling gun and Condiment King's ketchup and mustard stud shooters.
This LEGO® Batman™ toy is suitable for ages 7-14.
Measures over 6” high, 5” long and 7” wide.
